message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I know it would be a valuable asset to you. To start, I'm proposing a price of $15,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I believe we can reach a more agreeable price. My counteroffer for the product is $12,000.

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your understanding of the product's value. While $12,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $14,000. I believe this price point represents a fair deal for both of us.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my assessment, I would like to propose a price of $13,000 for the product.
